org.resthub.web.validation

Interface ValidationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValidationServiceImpl

    public interface ValidationService
    Provides service methods to export validation constraints configured on a given model object. This interface is validation provider agnostic and could be implemented to support any kind of validation constraint API

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClass(Class<?> clazz)
      Find validation constraints for a model class and return their representation
      ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClass(Class<?> clazz, Locale locale)
      Find validation constraints for a model class and return their representation.
      ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClassName(String canonicalClassName)
      Find validation constraints for a model class name and return their representation
      ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClassName(String canonicalClassName, Locale locale)
      Find validation constraints for a model class name and return their representation.

    • Method Detail

      • getConstraintsForClassName

        ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClassName(String canonicalClassName)
                                           throws ClassNotFoundException
        Find validation constraints for a model class name and return their representation
        Parameters:
        canonicalClassName - complete class name of the model to find
        Returns:
        a ModelConstraint wrapper containing all validation constraints retrieved for the given canonicalClassName
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if canonicalClassName does not match any class

      • getConstraintsForClassName

        ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClassName(String canonicalClassName,
                                         Locale locale)
                                           throws ClassNotFoundException
        Find validation constraints for a model class name and return their representation. This method also enhances constraints with concrete resolved constraint error message depending on the given locale
        Parameters:
        canonicalClassName - complete class name of the model to find
        locale - Locale object used to resolve localized messages, if any
        Returns:
        a ModelConstraint wrapper containing all validation constraints retrieved for the given canonicalClassName
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if canonicalClassName does not match any class

      • getConstraintsForClass

        ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Find validation constraints for a model class and return their representation
        Parameters:
        clazz - class of the model to find
        Returns:
        a ModelConstraint wrapper containing all validation constraints retrieved for the given clazz

      • getConstraintsForClass

        ModelConstraint getConstraintsForClass(Class<?> clazz,
                                     Locale locale)
        Find validation constraints for a model class and return their representation. This method also enhances constraints with concrete resolved constraint error message depending on the given locale
        Parameters:
        clazz - class of the model to find
        locale - Locale object used to resolve localized messages, if any
        Returns:
        a ModelConstraint wrapper containing all validation constraints retrieved for the given clazz
